item.simplefluidtanks.tank.tooltip_detai:
§7Use the §bwrench §7while §bsneaking
§7to remove a tank from the
§7multiblock structure.
§9Holds up to §b%d §9buckets of fluid.
item.simplefluidtanks.valve.tooltip_deta:
§7Use the §bwrench §7on the valve to add
§7new §btanks §7to the multiblock structure
§7without loosing any fluid. Note that
§7the valve counts as a §btank §7towards
§7the total capacity and emits a redstone
§7signal in conjunction with a §bcomparator§7.
item.simplefluidtanks.wrench.tooltip_det:
§7Used to instantly dismantle §btanks
§7and §bvalves§7. Also used to add new
§btanks §7to the multiblock structure.
item.simplefluidtanks.portable_tank.tool:
§7A small portable fluid tank.
§7Hold §bsneak §7when using to fill,
§7let go to drain.
§9Holds up to §b%d §9buckets of fluid.
config.input_valid:

config.input_invalid:

config.needs_world_restart: Changing this value requires a restart to take effect!
config.buckets_per_tank.tooltip: The amount of fluid one tank block can hold measured in buckets. If this value is changed, all tanks already placed in the world need to be manually updated by right-clicking the valve with the wrench.
config.buckets_per_portable_tank.tooltip: The amount of fluid one portable tank can hold measured in buckets. Changing this value affects already existing portable tanks and may lead to loss of fluids if the value is lowered.
config.tankblock_hardness.tooltip: The amount of hits the tank can take before it breaks (-1 = indestructible).
config.valveblock_hardness.tooltip: The amount of hits the valve can take before it breaks (-1 = indestructible).
